summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GitLab Pipeline Monitor application. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all endpoints working correctly. Frontend UI is 95% functional with excellent integration between components. All core features including dashboard statistics, pipeline filtering, detail views, job logs, and pipeline actions are working as expected.

ui_bugs.issue: Minor timeout when closing mobile sidebar toggle

passed_tests: All 12 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Dashboard statistics display and real-time updates
Projects section showing 3 mock projects correctly
Pipeline list with 15 pipelines grouped by date
Pipeline filtering by project, branch, and status
Pipeline detail page with stages and jobs in proper order
Test results display (passed, failed, skipped counts)
Job logs viewer with error highlighting
Mobile responsive design with sidebar toggle
